entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
